articles.title: Trump rails against Jewish Americans who don't vote for him in speech focused on antisemitism - CBS News
articles.description: Former President Trump said if he doesn't win in November, "the Jewish people would really have a lot to do with that if that happens."
articles.content: Washington, D.C. — Former President Donald Trump criticized Jewish Americans who don't vote for him in speeches aimed at addressing antisemitism Thursday night in Washington D.C., while claiming that… [+2525 chars]

articles.title: Report: Cancer deaths have dropped, but alcohol is factor in new cases - The Hill
